meanings.definition: A group of sports teams that play against each other
meanings.sent1: In the local youth league, my team competes against other teams every weekend.
meanings.sent2: The baseball league consists of eight teams competing for the championship.
meanings.sent3: The soccer league had a hilarious mascot race during halftime.
meanings.sent4: The basketball league is a battlefield where teams fight for victory.
meanings.sent5: Joining the swim league helped me improve my skills in the pool.

meanings.definition: A unit of distance equal to three miles
meanings.sent1: The ship traveled many leagues across the vast ocean.
meanings.sent2: The marathon runner completed several leagues during the race.
meanings.sent3: The pirate's treasure was said to be buried leagues beneath the ground.
meanings.sent4: The adventurer journeyed leagues through the dense jungle.
meanings.sent5: The knight rode leagues to rescue the princess from the dragon's lair.

meanings.definition: A group of people or organizations with a common purpose or interest
meanings.sent1: The environmental league worked together to clean up the park.
meanings.sent2: The book club is a league of avid readers who meet every month.
meanings.sent3: The superhero league had a potluck to celebrate their latest victory.
meanings.sent4: The league of artists painted a beautiful mural in the city square.
meanings.sent5: Joining the cooking league taught me new recipes and techniques.
